Dispatcher.name: Dispatcher
Authentication.title: Authentication
Authentication.error: An error has occurred, unable to authenticate. Please try again later.
Authentication.notauthenticated: You are not authenticated yet. Please authenticate to receive events.
Event.alert.ignore.title: Ignore Event
Event.alert.ignore.text: I'm not interested in accepting the event
Event.alert.cancel.title: Cancel Event
Event.alert.cancel.text: I don't want to take care of the event anymore
Event.alert.accept.title: Accept Event
Event.alert.accept.text: I want to take care of the event
Event.alert.finalise.title: Finalise Event
Event.alert.finalise.text: I have finished taking care of the event
Event.alert.taken.title: Event taken already
Event.alert.taken.text: Sorry, this event was already accepted by another volunteer. Thank you for your time!
Event.alert.takeError.title: Error Accepting Event
Event.alert.takeError.text: Sorry, unable to accept this event. Please try again, if error persists please contact administrator
Event.error.notfound: Sorry, unable to find event details. Please contact administrator.
Feedback.description: {name}, thank you for taking care of the event.
Feedback.action.finalise: Please write down a short feedback about the event before finalising it.
Feedback.action.cancel: Please write down a short feedback about the event and why you decided to cancel it.
Feedback.title: Feedback
Home.title: Home
About.Startach.title: Startach
About.MyCities.title: My Cities
About.AddCity.title: Add City
About.EditCity.title: Edit City
About.Startach.p1: Startach is a social initiative aimed at developing technological solutions to contribute to and assist different audiences in Israeli society.
About.Startach.p2: Startach brings together people with social and environmental awareness, caring and goodwill, and mobilizes them to create solutions for improving reality and the world.
About.Startach.p3: We are in constant search for great ideas and great people. Want to join? Get in touch with us!
Offline.alert.title: No Connection
Offline.alert.description: Your device is currently disconnected and we are unable to authenticate the logged in user. Please make sure you have a working internet connection to use this application.
NotificationReport.title: Notifications
